website_summaries.verdict: This is a soft and luxurious fleece robe that will keep any man warm all winter long with plush fabric and a cuddly hood.
pros: Perfect selection for men of all sizes, even those big and tall
Has a hood for extra comfort and warmth
Long length provides complete warmth and comfort
Robe doesn’t feel overly heavy while on
Available in a range of colors
cons: Material is not very absorbent, not ideal to wear right out of the shower

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit & High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Saying I'm a big guy is an understatement. I'm 6'6" and 330lbs. Even after reading reviews I was very skeptical about the fit and if it did how good it would be. It fits me great and it's very well made. I'm very surprised as I usually have to pay more given the extra material for this size especially compared to my wife's I bought at the same time for the same price. She loves hers to by the way and is very much smaller than me. So, if you're a big guy buy with confidence and if not you'll still love the fit and solid quality you'll get here.
customer_reviews.author: coryc13

customer_reviews.title: Sizing of the Robe is Odd
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Large/XL size. I liked the basic style, the thickness and the deep blue color of the robe I received. It fit my lower body perfectly but was far too small for my upper body. The arms were 5" too short and the shoulders were too tight. I am 6 feet tall and weigh 162 pounds. I would suggest the manufacturer rethink the cut of the robe to fit more normal body types. Regretfully I sent it back as the robe was warm and snug.
customer_reviews.author: Maominglu

customer_reviews.title: like wearing a fleece blanket
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit big all around but I'm 3xl and this is a 3xl/4xl so no surprise there. It is long but again I'm a little over 5'10" so if your 6' and stocky this will fit fine. I'm going to have it shortened a couple inches because it is very warm and comfortable. The static electricity from the fleece could probably power a small town but doesn't bother me. If you have light colored pets forget fleece. Between the static and the way fleece collects fur you'll be looking like your pets big sibling in short order. But I like it.
customer_reviews.author: dave d

customer_reviews.title: Check out the sleeves - updated 19-1118
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one of these I've purchased. This one was a gift for a father-in-law. It went over REALLY well! The 1st one was purchased over a year ago and has held up really well through multiple washings and a lot of wear. The plush is still plush, it's still warm and comfortable. I'd have given it 5 stars except that I prefer fuller sleeves, like the monk's robe type. That's really a minor gripe. Fit on the robe is great, also. A lot of online clothing (such as from DressLilly) is much smaller than the size chart would indicate. I'm 5' 8" and a large is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Keith M. Hamm

customer_reviews.title: A King's Robe
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't do reviews on Amazon these days, but I've got to say that this robe is super comfortable. Not only that, but you kind of feel like you are wearing the robe of Henry the 8th or something. I mean really, it is a classic design, but not until you actually wear the robe do you feel how comfortable it is. Although my cousin has mentioned I look like Santa Claus while wearing it, I would prefer to just walk around with this if it were socially acceptable to do so. LOL. Either way, this thing is great! Fits like a glove and has an all-star appeal to it! A ROBE FIT FOR A KING!
customer_reviews.author: M. Fara

customer_reviews.title: Love It! Worth the few dollars more.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Heavy and warm and really absorbent and the length is also what I love.. Great to lounge in after a shower or prior to bed. But it does get warm. I am in Southern GA and it was warm even with AC on. It should really be good when the weather turns. Otherwise you can curl up on couch with hood up and fall asleep. I do know who likes more, me or my two dogs. They love curling up in it! Excellent Product at an Excellent Price. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: merc669

customer_reviews.title: Short Sleeves and Overall Length
customer_reviews.text: This robe is weird. It’s nice in the ways that it’s soft and warm, but the XL/XXL size isn’t as long as I thought it would be, on a 6’0/6’1 man who wears XL/XXL t-shirts and a 34” inseam in pants, it reached about mid-calf. I was wanting something that’s go to his ankles. Secondly, it’s very wide, plenty of space that way, but the sleeves don’t even reach his wrists either. So the robe itself if shorter than expected and the sleeves are very short unless you have short arms. We’re keeping it because he opened it for Christmas and we’ll just deal with it. But not completely pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Stuczynski

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend LOVES this robe! It was supposed to be a Christmas present, but I gave it to him early. He wears it everyday and says “I’ve never been a robe guy, but I’m considering life as a hermit now, so I can wear this all the time. Literally life changing.” It’s warm, soft, fits well & he looks pretty sexy in it too.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a robe so soft. I am a picky guy, normally hating synthetic anything, always demanding 100% cotton in all things. But these new woven supersoft blankets and throws are kind of wowing me. And this robe is made from the same material...SUPER soft. I love it. It is my 'sit in a chair when I am cold' robe and I bought a very bid size purposely so I would swim in it. Fine by me as it is for reading or watching TV. One complaint, very small one, is that the belt does not have loops. But it's no big deal. LOVE THIS ITEM!
customer_reviews.author: DAVISION INC.

customer_reviews.title: Generously Cut !
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful robe - well made and very handsome but I really ordered it too large. The cut of the robe is clearly more generous than I expected so I'll probably order an additional but smaller one. The much larger one will be perfect on a cold winter's day or night when some snuggling is in order. The kids say I resemble one of the Star Wars Sand People when I wear it. There's always a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkski

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: This robe is very nice and well worth the money, the 2 tone def makes this a primary robe whether at work or for home, my sleeves def covered both of my arms and the robe went down to my slippers WITHOUT touching the ground and sitting in my office chair this doesnt touch the ground as well. I'm 6'1 187lbs athletic tone and I got the 1x/2xl it will fit perfectly for some maxed out at 6'2 maybe 200lbs
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Read the description.
customer_reviews.text: This is a double sided heavy velour . There is no inside lining just the black trim for collar and cuffs. It does look like the photo I like their patch pockets instead of slant cut. One fault I have is that they put a inside tie on the robe so that you can tie it closed, problem is it should be on the other side because if you use that tie it covers up the right-hand pocket and you can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Sleeves are too short
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking robe that appears to be of quality material but sleeves are too short. This also won’t work if you’re looking for something to throw on right after a shower is the fleece material isn’t going to dry you. I sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Helmholtz_Watson

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT product!!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried as I have been burnt by clothing shopping on Amazon before, but this robe is something out of a pricey hotel room! Fits great, SUPER soft, hood is very large. My kid looks like a monk or warlock walking around the house in it lol. We got a 1x/2x and he's a bit over 6'3'' and about 255-260 and it fits him perfect. Not too tight, even a bit baggy. Great bath robe :)
customer_reviews.author: blkdeath75

customer_reviews.title: Great, but Mind the Static
customer_reviews.text: The robe was everything my husband was looking for but with one drawback. It was soft and warm, and it was the appropriate size. Sadly, the static this gives off is like an electric power plant. In the dark, you can see the sparks when taking it on/off, and you'll often shock other people or yourself. He now only wears it after showering when the risk of it coming into contact with other materials is reduced. Back to cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Bunbury3

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy as a gift to early. Fits very large.
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for me Christmas. My wife likes to shop early. When I tried it on it is way to big but return time has expired. Something I just got is useless. Too bad the material is awsome.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Made for tall men/women XXL fits my 6"5 husband perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This robe is AMAZING BUT It is also made for a big dude. My husband is 6"5 with broad shoulders and the XXL fits him perfectly and goes all the way down to his feet. I am 5"7 and wouldn't be able to wear it bc it's so long. The material is really nice and heavy. SUPER warm and soft. Hope that help.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Romeo

customer_reviews.title: comfy and heavy
customer_reviews.text: the material is reasonably absorbent if you've just showered and the 1x-2x was the right size for me even though I typically need and 3x or 4x from most big&tall items. (i'm big not tall). the robe comes down to my ankles to it might be too long if you're 66 inches or less in height. I'm very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: fineshmecker

customer_reviews.title: Long enough for taller people, generously sized, warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic robe. It is soft, long, and comfortable. It is superior to most of the more expensive robes I have bought over the years. One of its main positive attributes is its size. Is actually long enough for taller guys and warmer because it comes lower on the legs. The material is thick and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great buy worth every penny, soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: So I ending up purchasing the 3/4xl A very good decision on my part 5’7 290 and I like my clothes a little big me just to be comfortable that’s all. It really soft and fluffy first thing I did was wash it before trying it on cold / delicate for drying then bam tried it on and I’ll be comfy this winter. Thanks to the salesperson it shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: heavy
customer_reviews.text: my first impression of this robe compared to the Amazon essential one is that this one is a lot heavier. but it keeps you so warm and cozy it almost makes up for it. the second i got this i hopped in the shower and used this afterwards. the pockets on it are nice and deep enough to hold your phone. long enough to cover my legs and i am 5'11"
customer_reviews.author: Mr Dude

customer_reviews.title: Fit is So/So
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'1, 250lbs. Ordered XL. Fits great across chest/shoulders. Good length too! Cuffs were about 3" too short though. The edge of the sleeves has the puffed fabric you can probably use a seam ripper to flatten out and extend sleeve length a few more inches as needed.
customer_reviews.author: figgins

customer_reviews.title: TOO DARN BIG.... WHAT A SHAME.  (It has been returned to Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I very much liked the soft feel of the material of this bathroom. I like the way the hood fit. I also like the fact that the bathrobe had a rope on each side of the inside of the bathrobe to keep it shut. What was disturbing though is I looked at the size chart and came out as I expected medium to large. When I put this bathrobe on, three of us could have fit in this bathrobe! If there was a zero, I would give it a zero despite some of it’s good qualities.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent worth 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: I put this Robe on as soon as I received it. First off it was delivered quickly. I feel in love with this Robe as soon as I put it on. It is top quaily, very comfortable,soft, warm and comes all the way to the ankles. I definitely recommend this product and Vendor. I wish I could give it a higher rating than 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rick D.

customer_reviews.title: No Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: 1st robe the right sleeve almost 2 inches shorter than left. Ordered replacement - 2nd robe exact same problem. Took 2nd robe to seamstress and she measured sleeve length. Right was shorter. According to chart the right sleeve was correct length for medium garment. Poor quality control on piecework assembly.
customer_reviews.author: OL Buzard

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable robe, but it bleeds on itself when you wash it
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking robe. It's very comfortable. The pockets are great too. However, I am only giving it 3 stars because it bleeds on itself the first time you wash it. I used 3 color catchers with it and the white still faded. The robe is no longer dark blue and white, it's dark blue with light blue trim.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Its like a blanket with arm holes
customer_reviews.text: This product was such a success in my household that everyone wants to wake up early just to wear it. It was a great buy personally but I dont think its made well enough to be a gift. There are many strands of loose thread that I had to track down, knot and cut off. But this product keeps me warm so I would warn someone about the loose threads before they buy!
customer_reviews.author: Pat H

customer_reviews.title: REALLY
customer_reviews.text: THIS ROBE IS A CHEAP KNOCKOFF OF A QUALITY TERRY CLOTH ROBE. IT WAS GIFTED TO ME WHICH IS THE ONLY REASON I'D EVER PUT IT ON MY BODY. I'M SURE THE FIRST TIME ITS' WASHED WILL BE THE LAST TIME IT'S WORN THIS THING IS GOING TO SHRINK LIKE A DOLLAR STORE TEE SHIRT. NOT DISRESPECT MENT TO DOLLOR STORE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very plush, true to color
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. He is 6’0 and 230. He was very surprised by the length and loved it! The only thing that he could have had different was the arm length. Afraid of exchanging for a larger size to just get the arm length so I just snipped the stitching holding the cuffed area in place. Now it fits right at his wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Days

customer_reviews.title: Quite satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My fiance is not a morning person and shivers every morning, so this robe is nice,warm, thick and heavy, long - everything I had in mind... The sleeves were short (he is 6.1) but I undid the stitching on the cuffs and fixed the length. The stitching inside is the only reason I am giving 4 starts instead of 5: it is sloppy made, there were threads hanging loose, some fiber all over the robe so I used roller to pick everything up before I gifted it. Good buy overall.
customer_reviews.author: ANASTASIYA KELLY

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASH WITH ANY OTHER CLOTHS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and is comfy but... 2 out of 5 starts because the material is possibly the lowest quality fuzzy material I now own. This sheds more than any other fuzzy towel, blanket, or rob I have ever had! You can not wash this with any other clothing else they will be absolutely covered in lint and fuzz balls from the robe. For the prize I was expecting better quality. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sinep Hardington

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice
customer_reviews.text: I was anticipating a bit more weight but this robe is very warm! I’m six feet tall (bought xxl), the sleeves fall to my knuckles, the bottom is about six inches off the ground. Very soft though I haven’t washed it yet. I’ll update this review if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Completely covered in little fuzzy lint balls after one wash.
customer_reviews.text: The robe completely filled the lint drawer after one gentle/low heat wash and dry cycle. It is now covered in little fuzzy lint balls that now get all over everyone and everything. I tried using a lint roller to remove some of them. Covered the roller -- barely made a dent. I've let it going on an air fluff tumble several times, filling up the lint drawer again and again. Each time it comes out it's covered in little balls of lint. Basically the robe is low key falling apart after one wash. Was quite comfortable, but $60 for something that will not survive a gentle wash/low heat dry is a god damned joke.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bunting

customer_reviews.title: I love the hood
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my husband who usually wears XL. I bought 2XL. He said it felt too big and didn’t wear too often. It was just the shoulders that were wider. I use it more than him, I call it my blanket robe. I’m 5’6” and it touches the floor. I love the hood!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a friend who is 6'3". It fits as promised XL/1XL. We did a quick measurement of his arms and from shoulder to ankles. I wish it were a little more plush and thicker as one I ordered but my friend is happy with it so I'm happy. I'll try to add a photo next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmchie

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my husband one of these awhile ago and it was too small, but he liked the feel, so I ordered up a size. He loves how you can wrap yourself up in this and feel cozy and warm and the length is great for Alaskan winters. Will be buying more of these for family members!
customer_reviews.author: Carol F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for the Wife and Myself they are well made and feel and look great
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item
customer_reviews.text: Prefect, better than I expected. I love the length, down to my ankles. The color combination is great, I ordered the grey on black. It is warm and comfortable and the hood is a nice bonus that really adds to the wearability of the rob. It has inside ties as well as the belt, which I haven't seen in years. High quality, warm and comfortable. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Retired in Bama

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: This robe is simply amazing. Great quality, super comfy. As for sizing: I’m 6’ and a hefty 270, I got the 1xl-2xl and it fits great. Wraps around me and overlaps substantially, and goes all the way down to just over my ankles. It’s really great.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Great! Long enough!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my hubby, he’s 6’5” tall. This is the first robe that I’ve bought that’s actually long enough (goes down to mid calf) and he loves the hood! He’s bald and he gets chilled, but he said his noggin stays warm with the hood on.
customer_reviews.author: Gloverrivergirl

customer_reviews.title: Sleeves are short.
customer_reviews.text: Super warm and comfortable. Two complaints; first being it gets little red bits of fabric all over you so dont wear it with any other clothes. The second is that although the robe is the perfect length, the sleeves are rather short leaving about a 2" gap down to my wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Felscream

customer_reviews.title: Recipient of this robe is very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this robe for large manly husband in deep dark red. Gorgeous, soft, comfortable. The size and length are on the generous side of true-to-size. He likes it very much and highly recommends!
customer_reviews.author: Janis Guyette

customer_reviews.title: Just what was advertised nice robe big and warm
customer_reviews.text: Just received on time I wanted it a bit big and it’s great. A bit warmer than I thought but that’s ok. Only complaint is the cheap inner ribbon tie should have been same as belt. Time will tell how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Bobav

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my husband. Other than joking about looking like a monk, he seems to really enjoy it. He's very sensitive to cold and so far this has kept him warm. He's very picky about clothing, so if he doesn't complain then you know its a winner.
customer_reviews.author: DaDaDa20

customer_reviews.title: Decent, A Little Over Priced
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to determine the size from the reviews and this is one of the few apparel items I’ve bought online. I bought the XXL and I’m 6’ tall and 180 lbs and slim. The robe wraps me 1 and 1/2 times over, making the overall fit a bit large. That being said, it is very soft and very warm. I wear my robe daily in the morning, and the fact that the sleeves cover my long arms and the robe falls to my ankles is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: General Xaotin

customer_reviews.title: Best Robe!
customer_reviews.text: The robe is everything I hope it would be. It's plush, comfortable, warm & soft. A perfect fit.. Both my girlfriend & I love how it feels to touch. An excellent product. I HIGHLY recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Fastidious Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a big, tall man. 6'4"
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my boyfriend. He is 6'4" with a 40inch pant size. I got a size 1x/2x. This robe wrapped around him with room to spare (without being too big), it goes down to his ankles and the arms are full length. It's super soft, warm, not too heavy. Has pockets and a hood. He is a happy man in his new robe. His friend's are all asking where he got it!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: awesome, heavy and huge
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this a bit bigger than I usually wear and should have ordered a size smaller but when it comes to big heavy robes, bigger is fine. It's comfy and ankle length for me. Perfect when waking up on cold winter mornings and I'm getting coffee and heading my home office.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Best. Purchase. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I'm serious you guys.. this robe is no joke. I just moved into my own place (I've had a roommate since my freshman year of college, and that was 6 years ago), and decided to try out the "robe life".. and I'm blown away at how comfortable this is. Absolutely love it. The hood makes it a 6 star.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy....but....
customer_reviews.text: It's too short in the sleeves. I got the L/XL size and for a big and tall, I was expecting to have longer sleeves. Hood is great, as well as the pockets and the length of the robe... just wish the sleeves were about 2-4 inches longer without having to go to the 2XL/3XL size.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M.

customer_reviews.title: These Robes Are A Hit As Gifts
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my nephew, and he loves this robe. He loves the look of it how it feels against his skin, and the color. So, this was a hit. Last year I bought one for my niece. I had their names embroidered on each of their robes to add a little elegance to each robe.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnell

customer_reviews.title: Great robe, esp for tall men
customer_reviews.text: This fits just as expected. Warm, soft, well made product that is longer than other robes. The hood is non intrusive. He hasn't used anything else since it's arrival!
customer_reviews.author: Inspired

customer_reviews.title: Excellent....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my husband. Searched high and low to find a robe that would fit not only a big man but also a tall man. Also, paid a reasonably high price for the robe especially when it was intended to be shipped all the way to the UK. But, it was absolutely worth every penny spent. The quality is good, the size is great and the length is super. Couldn't have asked for more. He is one happy man. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Papatee

customer_reviews.title: Big and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I knew that it was going to be a big robe. It fit perfect for me. I wanted it big. I felt like I got lucky. It wasn't to long. I am 6 ft. It is just above my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Regrut

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this robe. For years I have tried to buy something like this long well made and warm. This was perfect and my husband was so happy to have something cover his whole body. So worth the price and happiness.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over for a good robe with a hood and couldn’t find it anywhere. Ordered this one and could not be happier. It was here by Christmas and is exactly what I was looking for. It is soft comfortable warm and has a hood
customer_reviews.author: Sharron

customer_reviews.title: Worth Temptimg Death Over
customer_reviews.text: This robe is very elegant and warm- pretty much an ideal robe. ( I’ve almost been killed several times- tripping on the hem- but, hell, it’s worth it.)
customer_reviews.author: T Shannon Doyle

customer_reviews.title: SHEDS SHEDS SHEDS
customer_reviews.text: Sheds way too much. Sheds Sheds Sheds. This will be on everyone and everything. I took to wash and thought that would help but it's still SHEDDING. WORST ROBE EVER!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pammy

customer_reviews.title: It is not a bath robe.
customer_reviews.text: This robe advertised and marketed as bath robe. it should be marketed as a robe. isn't bath robe supposed to dry you out after a bath. This robe does not absorb any water and it squeaks while trying to put it on while you wet. So if you are looking for a robe to dry you out after a bath DO NOT BUY THIS ONE. It is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great robe! Teen son loves it and the hoody feature too!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and teen son was very happy with gift. He LOVED the hoody feature too! Teen boys love the hoody so the fact it’s on the robe is “cool” (at least that’s what I was told) LOL Anyway, good purchase- very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Long length is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The sleeve on the S/M could've been another inch longer for my husband, but he loves it anyway. It is a very warm, soft, comfy robe. Couldn't find anything comparable in the stores. So glad the fleece part is as lush as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Hollister

customer_reviews.title: A good buy a good price!
customer_reviews.text: I just love it. Very warm and comfortable. I would buy another one when I need one. I would recommend washing it first before wearing it. JJr. OC. CAL.
customer_reviews.author: JJStryyker

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Think the arm length could use to be just a little shorted, but i imagine it will shrink a little bit after washing a few more times.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Telford

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great robe, material is very soft and very thick. It fits very well, sleeves all the way to the wrist and length to just below the ankles. (I'm 6'1") Its very warm and exactly what I was looking for. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jeff hindman

customer_reviews.title: Heavy weight! warm! soft! ♡
customer_reviews.text: Love this robe!!! Its heavy weight durable! Extremely soft! Very warm!! I bought 2 one for my husband and I and we both absolutely love them! customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this robe! Comfy and warm, stylish and fit me like a glove. My son requested I order him one as soon as he saw it. You won’t regret buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Eylon David

customer_reviews.title: Ripped Pocket
customer_reviews.text: I looked at this and it looked so nice, the pocket is coming off and that bums me out. I thought this would be something nice. customer_reviews.title: Staticky
customer_reviews.text: Way too staticky! Also too bit for my husband. Good height just too big. This is a true BIG and tall robe. Just needed the tall portion for my husband.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!

Highly recommend!
